Author: stayawayjesus
Text: Just commented this on another post. After I eat more than I expected I lose more weight than I had estimated so maybe relax and have some tea. Take a bath or plan your meals for next week. Go for a walk. Hug your pets and stuff like that you know?

Author: sweetrarity23
Text: Idk how but I binged the other night and got up the next morning to weigh and expected to have gained like 5 pounds. But... I lost like 1.5 and idk how. Then I binged the next night and I had lost another 1.3. Idk how that happened. But I’m not complaining. Maybe it won’t be as bad as you think.  Sometimes if your weight loss is slowing or you’re not losing at all, a binge might help to speed your metabolism back up.
